title: How Many Calories in a McGriddle?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in a McGriddle, including full nutrition breakdown like carbs, protein, fat, sodium, and quick variations for your breakfast choice.
h1: How Many Calories in a McGriddle?
assumptions: Standard Sausage McGriddle with sausage patty, folded egg, American cheese, on maple-flavored griddle cakes; values based on McDonald's nutrition data.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, customizations, and preparation; always check McDonald's app or menu for latest info.

quick_answer.text: A Sausage McGriddle contains about 420 calories with 13g protein and 45g carbs.

label_note: Values mirror standard Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with fast-food info.

faqs.q: How many calories in a Sausage McGriddle?
faqs.a: Approximately 420 calories for the standard version.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in a McGriddle?
faqs.a: About 45g total carbs, including 15g sugars from the maple-flavored buns.

faqs.q: Is a McGriddle high in sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, around 780mg sodium per sandwich due to sausage and cheese.

faqs.q: How does Bacon McGriddle compare in calories?
faqs.a: Bacon version has about 370 calories, lower than sausage.

faqs.q: Can I make a lower-calorie McGriddle?
faqs.a: Opt for egg only (no meat/cheese) to drop to ~300 calories.
